faster-global.name: Skip Roll Dialogs (World Default)
faster-global.hint: Without Shift held, the roll configuration dialog will be skipped for all rolls.

auto-roll-item.name: Automatically Roll Item Checks
auto-roll-item.hint: Tool Checks and Attack Rolls will automatically roll when the item is used.

auto-roll-damage.name: Automatically Roll Item Damage
auto-roll-damage.hint: Damage rolls will automatically roll when the item is used. If there is an attack roll and it is a critical, it will make the damage roll a critical.

auto-roll-table.name: Automatically Roll Item Rollable Table
auto-roll-table.hint: (Requires Items With Rollable Tables DnD5e Module)

skip-attack-roll.name: Skips attack roll dialog and dice roll
skip-attack-roll.hint: Compatible with the fast roll settings above.

faster-local.name: Skip Roll Dialogs (Local Override)
faster-local.hint: Without Shift held, the roll configuration dialog will be skipped for all rolls.
